posts.post_content:
For Sale or Possible Cash/Trade 

From most recent REA Auction.  Ended up spending more on other cards, so I gotta free up some $.  Would accept what I paid for it cash $14,400 or possible cash/trade deal.  Would be interested in T206 Cobb's (mostly green version) or Rare T206 backs (BL - Uzit - Drum etc...)

Please let me know if you are interested 
you can PM or e-mail      [url]rtzcards@aol.com[/url]
thanks!
Darrin

[URL="http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=39395"]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=39395[/URL]
